snippet: David R. Lumley will retire this year but remain on the company’s board.
abstract: Spectrum Brands announces that chief executive David R Lumley will retire and that it will conduct internal and external search for successor.
lead_paragraph: David R. Lumley will retire this year but remain on the company’s board.

headline.main: Chief Executive of Spectrum Brands Is to Step Down
headline.print_headline: Chief Executive of Spectrum Brands Is to Step Down
